action.content:
You are playing a text adventure game. I will describe what you can perceive in the game. You write the single action you want to take in the game starting with >. Only reply with an action.
For example:
> open cupboard

Your goal for this game is: Put the banana in the freezer, the book on the side table and the plate on the table.

Once you have achieved your goal, write "> done" to end the game.

You are in a broom closet now. There are a mop and a broom. The mop is on the floor. The broom is on the floor. There is a passage to a hallway here.
I don't know what you mean.
I don't know what you mean.
> go out of the broom closet
I don't know what you mean.
I don't know what you mean.
I don't know how to interpret this 'exit' action.
I don't know what you mean.
> go out of the broom closet
I don't know what you mean.
I don't know what you mean.
I don't know what you mean.
I don't know what you mean.
> go out of the broom closet

> go out of the broom closet

I don't know what you mean.
> go through the passage to the hallway
I don't know what you mean.
You are in a hallway now. There is a potted plant. The potted plant is on the floor. There are passages to a kitchen and a broom closet here.
You are in a kitchen now. There are a cupboard, a refrigerator and a counter. The cupboard is closed. The refrigerator is closed. There are passages to a living room, a hallway and a pantry here.
The cupboard is now open. In the cupboard there is a plate.
You take the plate. In your inventory you have a plate.
You can't see a table here.
You are in a living room now. There are a shelf, a side table, a chair and a couch. There are passages to a kitchen and a bedroom here.
You can't see a table here.
> put plate on the side table
You put the plate on the side table.
You are in a kitchen now. There are a cupboard, a refrigerator and a counter. The cupboard is open. The refrigerator is closed. There are passages to a living room, a hallway and a pantry here.
You can't see a plate here.
You are in a living room now. There are a shelf, a side table, a plate, a chair and a couch. The plate is on the side table. There are passages to a kitchen and a bedroom here.
